title: N172 and N173 of Ohio Players
author: shernan30

posts.post_title: N172 and N173 of Ohio Players
posts.post_content:
Okay, Old Judge has past my initial review and I now have 3 Columbus Solon cards in my collection. I have spoke to a few of the experts on Old Judge cards, members of this forum as well, and done some review on the cards in the Goodwin book. Through all of this I have officially added Old Judge to my active collections.

I am looking to acquire players of all the Ohio teams, Cleveland, Columbus, Cincinnati, Mansfield, and Toledo. The goal is to add a card/cabinet a month to my set starting in April since I've already covered March with a nice Dave Orr from Legendary Auctions. 

For those collectors out there with Old Judge cards, I will be actively looking on BST for my collection. Feel free to shoot me a PM with what you have available.
I was wondering who outbid me on that Dave Orr.  Nice card.
